title: Land for sale In Nawala Facing Main Road
details: 28 perch land for sale in nawala facing nawala - rajagiriya main road. Approximately 135ft wide road frontage and with two access roads to the land one is from the main road other one is from araliya gardens road which is 40ft wide. A valuble pice of land with clear titles. Expecting 8 million a perch (negotiable ). For immediate sale call me for more details.
